Message:
I want to save them,
but what should I do?

There was only one thing
I could do—go to the Church
and testify to her not being
a witch.

But, there’s a chance I’ll be
labelled as an accomplice
and get arrested, too.

The inquisitor there is known
for using cruel torture methods.
If I’m caught, I might be...

And in the end, I locked the letter
away in my closet and pretended
that I had never read it.

While I closed my eyes and
lost myself in hesitation,

My lord...I want to become
someone like you.

Someone who, no matter
the danger, can risk their
life for those who are
important to them.

Well...until I manage to
apologize to them...
